screen_desc: It seems you haven't uploaded a screenshot yet. Could you please try again?
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
click on the "System" option located at the middle-lower part of the screen.
click on the "Languages & input" located at the upper left.
click on the "Virtual keyboard" settings located at the left and upper middle part of the screen.

think.Thought: The user is requesting to change the keyboard appearance. Based on the current screen, the available keyboards are listed, including Gboard, which is the most likely candidate for changing the keyboard appearance. I need to click on 'Gboard' to access its settings and modify the look of the keyboard.
Future Action Plan: Click on the 'Gboard' option to proceed to the settings where the keyboard appearance can be adjusted.
